info.author: Bram Moolenaar
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
The Aap program executes recipes. It is a kind of super-make program. In a
recipe you describe how to perform a certain task. Like a Makefile it contains
dependencies and build commands. Additionally, many powerful features are
included, such as automatic dependency checking, using signatures in addition to
time stamps, automatic downloading of files, publishing files on the internet
and much more.  Implemented in Python and Python can be used in build commands.
info.name: Aap
info.summary: A portable build tool (make replacement) with internet support
info.html_description: The Aap program executes recipes. It is a kind of super-make program. In a recipe you describe how to perform a certain task. Like a Makefile it contains dependencies and build commands. Additionally, many powerful features are included, such as automatic dependency checking, using signatures in addition to time stamps, automatic downloading of files, publishing files on the internet and much more. Implemented in Python and Python can be used in build commands.
